column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Cody - Thank you very much for your review. I'm very pleased to know you're a regular customer
column3: fast service at the bar. In our defense
column4: I will say that I have seen a great many couples who dine at our restaurant
column5: as they can be mostly identified by their holding each others' hands across the table as their ramen bowls are brought by their servers. ;-)
